hero.title: Modern And Well Planned Houses for Rent in Sector 113 Gurugram
description: Sector 113 Gurugram is an emerging residential locality located near the Dwarka Expressway, offering excellent connectivity between Gurugram and Gurgaon. Tenants searching for a house for rent in Sector 113 Gurugram are increasingly choosing this area because of its strategic location, modern infrastructure, and future growth potential. The sector provides smooth access to IGI Airport, Dwarka, and major business corridors, making it an attractive option for professionals working in NCR.

Independent houses in Sector 113 are designed with modern layouts, good ventilation, and a focus on comfortable urban living. The locality is surrounded by upcoming schools, healthcare facilities, daily convenience stores, and green open spaces, ensuring a balanced lifestyle. Choosing a house for rent in Sector 113 Gurugram is ideal for tenants who want a peaceful residential environment, strong road connectivity, and long-term value in a developing yet well-connected part of the city.

faqs.question: Is Sector 113 Gurugram a good area to rent a house?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 113 is a fast-developing locality with excellent connectivity via Dwarka Expressway.

faqs.question: What types of houses are available for rent in Sector 113?
faqs.answer: Independent houses ranging from 4 Marla to 14 Marla are commonly available.

faqs.question: Is Sector 113 suitable for family living?
faqs.answer: Yes, the area offers a peaceful environment with upcoming schools and healthcare facilities.

faqs.question: Are furnished houses available in Sector 113?
faqs.answer: Yes, furnished, semi-furnished, and unfurnished houses are available depending on the property.

faqs.question: What is the average rent in Sector 113 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Rental values vary based on plot size, furnishing, and exact location.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sector 113?
faqs.answer: Sector 113 has excellent connectivity to Gurgaon, IGI Airport, and Gurugram via Dwarka Expressway.

faqs.question: Are bachelors allowed to rent houses in Sector 113?
faqs.answer: Some landlords allow bachelors, while others prefer families.

faqs.question: Is Sector 113 safe for tenants?
faqs.answer: Yes, it is considered safe with growing residential development and security.
